data.text: ‚ÄúI recently stayed at the Ibis Deira City Center Hotel  and inadvertently left big amount of cash  in my room upon checking out. Upon realizing my mistake, I contacted the hotel, and the head of security, who was exceptionally courteous and professional, promptly confirmed that my money had been found. After verifying my identity, they graciously arranged for a trusted friend to collect the funds on my behalf. I am immensely grateful for their honesty, integrity, and outstanding service. This experience truly exemplifies the exceptional standards of the Dubai Ibis hotel, and I cannot thank them enough for their kindness and reliability.‚Äù
data.title: Thanks for honesty and dignity.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,

Thank you for choosing Ibis is Deira City Center Dubai for your stay. We appreciate the time you took to share a detailed review of your experience with us. I am delighted to know that you enjoyed your stay with us for various reasons.
Your positive feedback is highly appreciated, and I have shared it with the team to recognize their efforts in meeting your expectations and ensuring your satisfaction.

We look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to Dubai.

Best regards,
Sumit Gupta
Hotel Manager
owner_response.author: Sumit Gupta

data.text:
This hotel is conjoined with Novotel.
Received excellent service from the staff, and they're really friendly. Cleanliness 4/5. Across the street is a mall where you can just walk if you need to buy something. Beautiful place to stay and budget friendly. Dipesh did a good job with room service/cleaning the room.
data.title: Ibis Hotel

data.text: Excellent house keeping by Manram. Responsive and active and polite. Facilities are great as well. Thank you very much. Value for money hotel. Excellent location close to mall and metro station and other amenties.thank you very much. Appreciate it
data.title: Clean hotel with excellent location

data.text: I was in ibis deire city center dubai. Ibis is always one of my favorites when it comes to my business trips. I also want to thank Rahman for his great job cleaning the room. Very polite, helpful and cooperative. I was also in ibis muscat 3 times in the last 6 months and it seems that ibis hotels does its best to serve their customers all over the world with the same quality
data.title: Excellent room service
